job.title: Back-End Engineer
job.description:
We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer with exceptional computer science fundamentals to help scale our platform and take us to the next level. If you love high frequency, high throughput and low latency applications, then take a look at this!
Who are we?
We are a full-scale digital advertising marketplace that offers our clients end to end solutions through our platform to drive ROI.
What is the job?
Our core exchange team currently consists of 5 software engineers. As the newest senior member of this team you will help us solve our most challenging problems as our business and platform scales.
Our platform handles 20 billion+ requests per day and is the crown jewel of the organization. Built entirely with proprietary technology it is time to take things to the next level. The exchange is high traffic and high throughput. Scale, speed, and stability are core challenges we face.
You will work together with other members of the team to ensure we grow and scale while also saving time. You will build out new functionality while keeping things stable.
Who are you?
You are an exceptional software engineer who understands computer science fundamentals through and through. Simply put, you know how to build software right.
Our exchange technology is proprietary and we look for strong candidates with the following:
• Expertise in one or more back-end languages: C++, Java, etc.
• High Frequency, High Throughput, low latency application development experience
• Scalability, speed, and stability
• Strong understanding of Algorithms and Data Structures
• Expertise in Relational Databases
• System development
• Strong problem solving and the ability to understand and learn an unknown system
• AdTech experience is a Major Plus!
• Experience with Traffic Shaping is a plus!
What is in it for you?
This is an opportunity to take your technical career to the next level. You will join and disruptive organization that is operating at serious scale. We offer a highly competitive compensation and benefits package that includes:
• Base Salary DOE + eligibility for annual discretionary bonus!
• Medical, Dental, Vision
• 401k
• Flexible Time Off (we take wellbeing and work life balance very seriously!)
• Fully remote work environment!
• Too many other perks to list!
If this sounds interesting please apply today for immediate consideration!
